description:
Senpai should be studying for midterms, but he’s hooked on a game. Questions arise about what might happen if he were to flunk. Senpai and Nagatoro play rock-paper-scissors to see who has to carry their bags home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Igai to Tanoshii Kamo Shirenaissu ne, Moto Senpai / Janken Shimashou, Senpai!!
That Might Actually Be Fun, Senpai / Let`s Play Rock-Paper-Scissors, Senpai!!
Ça serait plutôt marrant / On joue à pierre-feuille-ciseaux
意外と楽しいかもしれないっスね, 元センパイ♥ / じゃんけんしましょう, センパイ!!
